mapper.insert: insert into user (id, user_name,role_code,site_id, nick_name, password, sex, email, phone, avatar, status, unit, address, creator, created_time, modifier, modified_time) values (#{id}, #{userName}, #{roleCode}, #{siteId}, #{nickName}, #{password}, #{sex}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{avatar}, #{status}, #{unit}, #{address}, #{creator}, now(), #{modifier}, now())
mapper.update:
update user
site_id = #{siteId},
nick_name = #{nickName},
password = #{password},
avatar = #{avatar},
sex = #{sex},
phone = #{phone},
email = #{email},
status = #{status},
unit = #{unit},
address = #{address},
modifier = #{modifier}, modified_time = now()
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, user_name, role_code, site_id, nick_name, password, sex, email, phone, avatar, status, unit, address, creator, created_time, modifier, modified_time from user where del_flag = '0' and id = #{id}
